name: pf-web
description: Experimenting with a simple pure functional + virtual DOM web app

scripts.build:todo: browserify -d src/todo/main.ts -p [ tsify ] | exorcist web/todo.js.map > web/todo.js
scripts.build:crud: browserify -d src/crud/main.ts -p [ tsify ] | exorcist web/crud.js.map > web/crud.js
scripts.build:fractal: browserify -d src/fractal/main.ts -p [ tsify ] | exorcist web/fractal.js.map > web/fractal.js
scripts.build: npm run build:todo && npm run build:crud && npm run build:fractal
scripts.watch: chokidar "src/**/*.ts" -c "npm run build && echo ----- Build done -----"

author: Luis Crespo
